pageTitle: ESRL Global Monitoring Division - Observation Sites
textBeforeTable: 140 sites in 45 countries SELECT DISTINCT site.num,code,name,country,lat,lon,elev,lst2utc FROM site,site_project WHERE site.num=site_project.site_num AND site_project.status_num in (1,3,5) AND lat>-90 AND lon>-900 AND site_project.project_num IN (1) AND code not like 'POC000' ORDER BY code Carbon Cycle Surface Flasks Water Vapor Profiles Water Vapor Trace gases from GGGRN Flasks Trace gases Airborne Flasks Trace Gases Unmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS) Trace Gases Airborne, Large Balloons and Aircraft HATS In Situ Observatory HATS Flask Sampling Halocarbons and Trace Gases Ozone Airborne Ozone In Situ Tall Tower Dobson Umkehr Ozone Ozonesonde Dobson Total Ozone Surface Ozone Ozone Black Carbon Meteorology Meteorology Antarctic UV GAW Radiation NEUBrew UV and Ozone Integrated Surface Irradiance Study Surface Radiation Budget Monitoring Baseline Surface Radiation Network Radiation In-Situ Observatory Solar Radiation Aerosol Mobile and Cooperative Platforms Lidar Aerosol Airborne, Light Aircraft Aerosol Surface In-Situ Aerosols Carbon Cycle Surface In Situ Carbon Cycle In Situ Observatory Carbon Cycle In Situ Tall Tower Carbon Cycle Airborne Flasks Carbon Cycle Surface Flasks Carbon Cycle Gases Select Project label { margin-bottom: 5px; } fieldset { margin-bottom: 10px; } }
